name: Baby Doll

name: Jersey
deskripsi: Jersey fabric is elastic and lightweight. The combination of both properties provides outstanding comfort, making it perfect for both everyday wear and formal events.

name: Spandek Balon
deskripsi: Made from elastic and flexible material, often containing spandex (or elastane), this fabric stretches and offers a comfortable fit.
